message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but $9,500 is a little too high for me. Would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position but $9,500 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me. How about we split the difference again and settle at $8,500?
